translations: 放映技师；电影摄影技师

sentences.sentence: He used the same cinematographer, Owen Roizman, to create a dark, intense atmosphere which was very un-American at the time.
sentences.translation: 他使用了同一个的电影摄影师，欧文•鲁伊兹曼，创造了一种当时美国人很不习惯的阴暗紧张的氛围。

sentences.sentence: Yu is the regular cinematographer of leading director Jia Zhang-ke.
sentences.translation: 余力为是知名导演贾樟柯的御用摄影师。

sentences.sentence: I know I said 'When in Gone Ember,' but this old cinematographer could use a drink.
sentences.translation: 我知道我说了是‘在岗恩伯(Gone Ember)’，但是这个老放映师是能喝的。
